 I've got to echo that one. emoticon_xgood emoticon_xhoho

It is testimony to the fact that human behavior is strongly controlled by social intelligence (something of an oxymoron.)
 
 I have been doing some reading about the evolution of intelligence and it seams that some are convinced that intelligence arose as a result of the demands of social living, not for finding food or survival problem solving.
 
 As a result we see the world through "social" colored glasses, so to speak.
 
 When I began to understand this idea I could see many things in a new way.
